General.Name: Aeolus Tyre Co Ltd
General.Description: Aeolus Tyre Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells tires for trucks and buses, OTR, and agro and construction machinery vehicles in China and internationally. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Jiaozuo, China.

1.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors & CFO
